ERGOMETRINE WITH OXYTOCIN

  • Indications and doses
  • Constituants
  • Medicinal forms

Indications and doses

Active management of the third stage of labour, Postpartum haemorrhage caused by uterine atony,

By intravenous injection

Bleeding due to incomplete miscarriage or abortion,

By intramuscular injection

Constituents

ergometrine maleate oxytocin

Prepared medicinal forms of ERGOMETRINE WITH OXYTOCIN

There can be variation in the licensing of different medicines containing the same drug.

Solution for injection
